features.featureTitle: Expand the products data in frontend/src/data/products.ts to include multiple individual products under each category: at least 3 products under Tufted Border Mirrors, at least 3 under Tufted Rugs, and at least 3 under Tufted Pillow Cases (and at least 2 under Tufted Mirror Rug). Each product should have a unique name, description, price, and reference a distinct product image. Update the ProductsPage and any category filtering/display logic to show all individual products per category.

Add a full-width editorial category showcase section on the homepage (Home.tsx), placed immediately below the 'OUR COLLECTION' product grid. The section should display three tall side-by-side panels in a 3-column layout, each panel filling with a large lifestyle/product background image, a bold editorial headline overlaid on the image (e.g., 'DEFINE YOUR SPACE' for Mirrors, 'GROUND YOUR ROOM' for Rugs, 'REST YOUR HEAD' for Pillows), and a minimal outlined CTA button centered in the panel linking to the relevant category. Style the layout consistent with the Bauhaus design system: uppercase bold typography, clean borders, and the brand color palette. This is directly inspired by the uploaded reference image showing three tall image panels with headlines and category buttons.
